title.rendered: This Week’s Featured Item & Bulk School Orders

content.rendered:
Featured Item

The Outsiders by S.E. Hinton is a teen classic and often required reading for schools. Gottwals Books has all you need in stock, 5.97 each (MSRP $9.99)! Remember, you can use your store credit for an additional 50% off.

School Orders – Click to View Our Brochure

Back to school = bulk school orders! Many school districts have discovered the benefits of placing their orders (both large and small) with Gottwals Books. We have relationships with multiple distributors and warehouses, allowing us to offer the lowest prices of any other book vendor. We are even cheaper than buying online!

Textbook Buy Back

Bring your college textbooks in for cash!

Toy of the Week

Melissa and Doug Musical Instruments

Introduce your child to musical concepts through hands-on play! Melissa and Doug’s range of beginner instruments are fun, colorful, and interactive.
